title: Indian Dental Network
description:
Indian Dental Network is an exclusive app for all Dentists in India. It provides a safe platform for dental professionals to discuss cases/queries, participate in quizzes/polls, and share their knowledge in a spam-free environment. Indian Dental Network is designed to integrate technology seamlessly into the lives of dental care providers to make patient care more efficient, by helping dentists stay current and connected with the entire dental fraternity effortlessly. This app has a zero learning curve and is extremely easy to use.

Key Features:

CDEs and Dental Events: Now you don‚Äôt have to miss out on fantastic educational opportunities to enhance your skills and knowledge. As a dentist, it is important to find out the latest and upcoming Continuing Dental Education and related events and workshops taking place around you; and that‚Äôs why we bring to you our unique CDE feature. Book for CDEs right through the App.

Dental Cases: You can create your own case studies easily to discuss and get help with patient diagnosis, prognosis and treatment planning, and all things related to dental care. You can also participate in multiple cases created by other dentists and indulge in some knowledge sharing. 

Dental Quizzes: You are a great dentist, and you want to take a break from your swamped schedule to unwind, without compromising on your dental care acumen. Play exciting quizzes created by dentists, for dentists, about dentistry, on Indian Dental Network, along with your friends connected within the app! Or even better, create your own quiz and challenge everyone.

Dental Jobs: You have access to a whole portal of dental jobs at your disposal. Find good, relevant dental jobs, per your interest and preferred metrics, and our smart system keeps learning and improving, based on your usage and feedback.

Dental Communities: You can join multiple communities, and interact with fellow dental professionals on Indian Dental Network, including your specialty-based groups, alumnus, city groups, medical association and many more. Be a part of group activities and benefit from the community.

Dental Connections: This is an all-encompassing platform for dental professionals, not just an app for dentists. Connect with any dentist you know and/or any dentist you would like to know, and grow your dental network. 

Post: Have a question to ask or an anecdote to share with your connections? Create a post and share it with your dental specialist friends. Have organised discussions on IDN, regarding new techniques, innovations, research or practice, and finance management.

Dental Associations: Is your association on-boarded with Indian Dental Network yet? If yes, find it and join it on IDN, and enjoy all the amazing features within your association, besides staying in sync with your association‚Äôs events and updates (announcement, circulars, notices, and news). If no, well, what are you waiting for, let us bring your association online.

Bookmark: Start bookmarking all the things you find interesting and would like to get back to sometime later, effortlessly. It will be much easier than finding a needle in a haystack.

Also get instant notifications to never miss any update, ever.

With the myriad of existing features and many more exciting features coming soon, you will find IDN to be not just your favorite app, but your go-to instrument for everything related to dentistry. 

Be a part of an intellectually enriching community experience. Be a part of Indian Dental Network!

Download Now and Get Started!

Follow us on-

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IndianDentalNetwork
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/indiandentalnetwork
Twitter: https://twitter.com/IDN_Dental
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/indiandentalnetwork

For any queries-
Drop us a line at support@healthpole.com

title: Philips Sonicare
description:
Have you ever wondered how well you are actually brushing your teeth? When you connect your Philips Sonicare toothbrush to the App, you‚Äôll receive personalized guidance and tips to improve your brushing habits, leaving you with a healthy mouth and smile. 

In the Philips Sonicare App:

Real-time brushing guidance 
The Sonicare app monitors your habits, like if you‚Äôre reaching all areas of your mouth, how long you brush or how much pressure you‚Äôre using, and coaches you with tailored advice. This coaching helps to ensure consistent, complete coverage, every time you brush.

Some features, like position sensing, are only available to DiamondClean Smart or FlexCare Platinum Connected users. 

Progress Report
The Progress Report connects to your Sonicare toothbrush to collect your brushing habits. Each week, you will receive an accurate, easy-to-read report, giving you the brushing insights you need to improve and maintain your oral health.

Teledentistry
The dentist is ready to see you! With Sonicare Teledentistry solutions, you simply provide some background info and a few photos of your mouth and receive a personalized, comprehensive dental evaluation from a Licensed Dental Professional, within 24 hours. 

Teledentistry solutions are only available in the United States. 

Automatic brush head reordering service
Never run out of replacement brush heads again. The Sonicare app monitors your brush head‚Äôs actual usage and the brush head reordering service automatically delivers replacements, right when you need them.

The brush head reordering service is currently available in the United States, United Kingdom, Germany, France, Spain, Japan and Italy.

REQUIREMENTS

Depending on which toothbrush you own and where you live, the Sonicare app helps you meet your oral health goals:

- DiamondClean Smart ‚Äì unlocks the full App experience, including position guidance and missed area notifications 
- DiamondClean 9000
- ExpertClean
- FlexCare Platinum Connected

Find out more about Sonicare connected toothbrushes by visiting: https://philips.to/connectedtoothbrushes

recentChanges: A redesigned experience makes setting up your toothbrush and app easier. Plus, technical updates improve the brush to app connection.
comments: Absolutely garbage app; cannot pair with my new toothbrush. I've tried literally everything. I've contacted their support team multiple times and did every step they requested (even the one where they told me to reset my connection settings with no explanation on what that entailed... which cleared out all stored WiFi/bluetooth data in my phone and still did not help.) They even sent me a replacement handle and guess what? That doesn't pair with the app either! So yeah, don't waste your time.

This app is mostly mediocre when it works. It is pretty dumb about recognizing the brush movement to the point where if you are leaning down it doesn't think you're brushing anything. On top of that it only checks for brushing front and back of teeth, not top. Also currently I can't even use it because it gets stuck trying to load the login popup forever. Feels very underbaked.

Generally a good experience but the last 7 days doesn't load most of the time and it's the reason for the rating. Also wish the brush had a memory to upload later. Taking phone into bathroom everytime (twice day) to record brush session isn't realistic and gets annoying. For the money this should be an included feature on future models.

10/24/2020 update: The latest update claims "A redesigned experience makes setting up your toothbrush and app easier. Plus, technical updates improve the brush to app connection" but the app only randomly connects with the toothbrush. I love the toothbrush but the app is now useless which is the #1 reason I bought the toothbrush. The app worked fine until the latest Android update on 10/01/2020 and now it will not connect to the toothbrush. This is the only Bluetooth connected device app I'm having trouble with after the Android update.

App doesn't get through setup. I have a OnePlus 6, and a new SonicCare Diamond brush. Unboxed it and fully charged it. Then downloaded the app. Lit up the toothbrush by pressing the mode button, opened the app and it detected the toothbrush ok. But once I got to the "Let's get started" page it just spins like a record. Tried restarting my phone and reinstalling the app. Can never get past that screen.

title: Fun Mouth Doctor, Dentist Game
description:
Becoming a dentist can be a fun and rewarding career, and with this fun mouth doctor game you get to have the chance to see what a dentist surgery gets to do in their practice. With this game you get to rinse the mouth, remove any sticky candy, clean the yellow teeth, remove plaque, reduce the swallow gums, along with pulling out the black rotten teeth and removing any invisible bacteria with a microscope. So if you want to try your hand at doing some simple surgery, why not have some fun with this free doctor game today and become a certified dentist. 

Features: 

Spray the mouth up with water so it can rinse out any bad bacteria
Remove any excess candy from the teeth with the small dental grinder
Clean the teeth with a special pick to remove any plaque from around the gums 
Scrub the yellow teeth with the toothbrush to help make them nice and clean
Remove the small floating bacteria from mouth with the use of a special light
Pull out all the black rotten teeth with the dental pliers before replacing them with new clean teeth
Help to fix any broken teeth with the drill to make a better smile
And many more dentist surgery features

title: Hippo Dentist Care
description:
In nature, the hippopotamus is the one that is considered a herbivore animal, but that doesn't mean that his teeth aren't in danger of destruction. Good thing is that real life there are certain birds that help him out to preserve a good oral hygiene, but in this game, his little bird gets lost, so your job is actually to replace the bird's attributes. Keep his teeth clean and if is necessary add a plus to his look with a new fresh outfit that you are about to create. The hippo just ate a big delicious watermelon and it seems like some rests get stuck into his teeth and now he is in a terrible toothache and even worst he could risks an infection if you don't react right away. Going to nature dental hospital you'll discover the right procedure for an untreated gum and no record of a previous care.
Use the medical devices and make all the bacteria disappear. Remove the foreign stuff that remained in his mouth, replace the rotten teeth, get rid of the bump that is bothering him, take care of those caries and remove the remaining food from his teeth. Clean his tongue and offer a professional brushing. Now that you've made him feel good about his teeth you have to do the same about his look. This part encourages your imagination to go crazy, create a funky nice look and try to add as many colorful accessories as you can. Complete the final attire with a nice pair of glasses or even a funny hat.

As you can see this game prepared plenty of interesting features and you could take a quick look at them right here if you want to:
- Cool procedure to execute
- Taking care of a cute animal
- Use what it takes to make the pain go away
- Variety of tools and processes to accomplish
- Free and easy to play
- Joyful music and pretty interface
- New abilities to gain during the process
- Understand the importance of a good hygiene
- Be a dentist and a designer for this hippo

title: Dental Assistant :
description:
Fun and engaging education game to learn about the various dental instruments used in dentistry.

- Covers most of the standard instruments used by dental professionals to provide dental treatments like      scaling, restoration, root canal treatment, extraction and denture.

title: Denti-Pro ‚Äî The Social App for Dentists Worldwide
description:
Denti-Pro is connecting dentists and dental health professionals around the world. Get easy
access to a professional community, read and share insightful and inspiring articles, magazine
posts, videos and dental photography features. The sheer amount of content made available has
made Denti-Pro a favourite app among dentists worldwide. We frequently receive emails from
dentists around the world, who love how the app has given them access to professional content
to fill in the various in-between time that comes with running a dental clinic. Find contests, dental
themed art and photography that inspires! And become part of a community of sharing
knowledge, insights, and passion for dentistry.
DENTIST MAGAZINE, NEWS AND ARTICLES
Get the latest industry news, updates, tips, and research, or visit our magazine section. All in one
user-friendly application, that lets you access content quick and easy when you need it. We post
frequently, and upload unique dental photography, art and contests for you to enjoy.
REGISTER AND CREATE A PROFILE
To get the most out of Denti-Pro Social, and be able to connect with dentist across the globe,
send messages, and even start collaborations, sign up a free profile and start connecting. Denti-
Pro is the first social media application exclusively for dentist networking and sharing of dental
resources and content!
CONTRIBUTE
To keep the platforms updated with new high quality content, we encourage dental professionals,
clinics, and researchers to share important dental news, articles, research results, videos, and
dental photography. If you have something the global dental community needs to know, see, or
read, go to contribute and upload it for dentists around the world to access. Post anything in a
glance and let other dental professionals enjoy your passion, thoughts and knowledge!
DENTI-PRO FEATURES:
- Social media for dentists
- Effective networking
- Informative content: news, articles, blogs, photos, art
- Frequent contests
- Chat feature
- Users can contribute with content
---------------------------
Get Denti-Pro, and experience the dentist profession in a completely new way!
Create a profile and start enjoying high quality dental content, or post your own.
Download Denti-Pro for FREE.

title: Mouth Care Doctor - Crazy Dentist & Surgery Game
description:
Welcome to Mouth Care Doctor - Crazy Dentist & Surgery Game, you have a chance to help your patients, to prove that you are a nice dentist! Gain experience to become the expert dentist and doctor.

Lot of people want to be a great dentist, it's your dream, yes? Now you get a chance to treat those tiny patients at the clinic in this dentist game!

Tiny patient is looking for a smart doctor who can clean, cure and beautify teeth. Are you the best doctor? 

Lets play! select your patient to check teeth/tooth problems .. They suffer from kinds of teeth problems like bad teeth, tooth cavity, dental calculus, dentist mania ...

Become the best dentist in town! Perform different treatments on your patients. Extract their teeth carefully without hurting them. Treat patients at the clinic in this dentist game with pretty cool dentist tools like mouth spray, dental pliers and braces, dentist mania! It's a very funny dentist game for people to practice, for creation, a sense of accomplishment!

Teeth Cleaning :
Lets Kill all germs hidden between the tooth , use tank cleaner to remove gems from tank and then wash it and suction the water.

Braces Placement :
Remove germs and wash it properly so we can Place braces all over the teeth so the irregular teeth gets in position.

Teeth Surgery : 
First of all Brush it properly so we can start surgery .Remove the black damaged teeth infection and do inject to remove mouth infection also.

Cavities Removal :
Firs of all spare to kill gems in mouth and then remove gems from teeth as well. Remove the damaged teeth properly and place with new one. Remove all kind of cavities and suction the water at the end.

Root Canal Creation :
Spray all over to get rid of bad breath. remove cavities as well and do root canal treatment.

Thank you very much for playing Mouth Care Doctor - Crazy Dentist & Surgery Game. We love creating educational and fun game for you. If you have any suggestions or questions, feel free to send us your feedback or leave your comments.

title: Dentacare: Jaws of Battle
description:
Become the ultimate Dentawarrior in Dentacare: Jaws of Battle ‚Äì the first and only educational trading card game that helps you develop healthy dental care habits!

Lock jaws and face your opponents in head to head combat to determine who can keep most of their teeth standing. Unlock new cards, build the ultimate deck and pave your way to the top. Do you have what it takes to become Arena Champion?

Breathe some fresh air into what has always been a dull chore and start having fun doing it for once. Learn, as you play - every card mimics the real world effects it has on your teeth, so you will be an expert on dental health in no time!

So what are you waiting for? Brush your teeth and prepare for battle!

Features:
- Collect fragments and assemble 45 unique cards
- Collect experience and level up through 50 levels of progression
- Battle enemies across 5 memorable arenas
- Build long-lasting healthy habits
- Have fun while brushing your teeth
- Complete achievements as you progress through the game
- Complete daily quests to unlock epic boss fights
- Learn the ropes with the tutorial
- Card laboratory
- Push notifications

All the credit for the music and sound effects goes to Idem Grey

https://twitter.com/GreyIdem

title: Dental Connect
description:
Dental Connect helps dentists make their dental purchasing easy and at the best price possible! This is a one stop shop app that offers a refreshingly new buying experience to oral care and dental care professionals in India.

Brought to you by Parekh Int. services Ltd., an authorised 3M Online Distributor for 3M, the most innovative company in the oral care and dental care industry, Dental Connect provides an easy solution for dentists to get authentic dental (clinical and non-clinical) products & materials at the best prices! Simply select the product you want to buy with the 3M authorized seller in your area and place your order in just a few seconds!

Making purchases for oral and dental care products and materials has never been easier!

Download now and experience the difference!

KEY FEATURES:
> Extensive Product Catalogue
3M products are categorized under three broad categories ‚Äì
 - 3M MyKit ‚Äì Customized procedural restorative kits
 - Oral Care ‚Äì Full range of oral care products for dentists
 - Clinic Care ‚Äì Full range of products to make your clinic more efficient
Each section contains complete product related information for all dental materials and products.

> Product Ratings & Reviews
User generated reviews (from dentists and oral care practitioners) will guide on you on the best product for your purpose.

> Call for Demo Request
If you are unsure of what you want to buy, you can schedule a Demo Request at your doorstep or use the on-call support feature.

> 3M Health Care Academy
Register for 3M Dental Workshops in your city and attend 3M CDE programs as part of the 3M Health Care Academy.

WHY Dental Connect:
> Best products at the best prices! Period!
With the 3M Connect app, you don‚Äôt have to worry about the quality of the product or about wasting time on price negotiations. You are always assured of premium standards at the best price!

> First to know about new product launches
3M regularly brings forth new and revolutionary products and materials in the oral and dental care industry. These new product launches will instantly be updated on the app, made available to you.

> Get notified on promotional offers & deals
You will be privy to deals of the week and other curated discount packages for app users only through regular in-app notifications.

> Ease of use, especially in case of repeat purchases.
The simple design layout and easy-to-use nature of the app makes the experience even better. You can look at your past orders and even create a wish list of products you want to watch out for.

3M Connect is currently available for India only, in select cities.

If you are a dentists or an oral care practitioner, download the 3M Connect Android app now and experience the convenience of purchasing ‚Äì anytime, anywhere!

For any queries or feedback, please write in to 3m.dentalconnect@gmail.com

title: Dental Simulator
description:
Dental Simulator is the brand new way of learning dentistry, an application that helps you, dental student, to be better prepared before start taking patients.

It offers a whole new experience of practicing dental procedures. The app makes usage of a 3D model, making the interaction with the app much more real and stunning, giving to the dental student and singular way of learning.


WHAT'S IN THE APP:

The app provides, for each procedure available:

STUDY MODE

Which includes:
  ‚Ä¢ Technique description: a reading material, where the student can read, learn and recall the theory of that technique.

  ‚Ä¢ A Clinical Video: a video that the student can see a real procedures being made.

  ‚Ä¢ A simulation video: a video of the technique being made in the app.

  ‚Ä¢ Practice mode: where the student can train that technique with transparency, so the student can see through the skin and learn how to do the procedure.


SIMULATION
The simulation mode is where the student will practice the procedure without the usage of transparency, making this mode closely to a real procedure.

AUGMENTED REALITY
In this mode, the user will have the most incredible simulation experience that a student could have. To have this, the student have just to download the trackers, so the device camera can plot the 3D models, and then try the mode with:

VR glasses:
With the VR glasses the simulation is elevated to the highest level of immersion that could be experimented through the app. The student gets totally in the procedure, and the simulation became as real as possible, giving to the student an unique experience that can be felt just by wearing the glasses!


Just the device camera:
Or the student can have a nice experience too just by making usage of the device camera, that is less immersive than the VR Mode but is also a great experience to the student that is learning and wants to have a deeper feeling of what is a real procedure.


FREE EXPERIENCE:
Dental Simulator can be downloaded for free and the student can have a sample of the procedures, by trying our 3D model in the Sandbox Mode, in which the student can see and explore the mouth and also make usage of the transparency feature, seeing also the cranium of the patient.


PROCEDURES AVAILABLE IN APP PURCHASE:

INFERIOR ALVEOLAR NERVE BLOCK ANESTHESIA - USD 4,99
The inferior alveolar nerve block is the most common type of nerve block used for dental procedures and one of the most difficult to learn. By having this technique the student can learn and practice, fixing the theory and improving their skills.

LOCAL INFILTRATION ANESTHESIA - USD 1,99
Local anesthetics reversibly block nerve conduction near their site of
administration, thereby producing temporary loss of sensation in a limited area.

SOON:

More procedures, such as other anesthesia techniques, canal treatment, dental implants and more.

title: BraceMate
description:
Make your experience with braces with your orthodontist more exciting by creating different patterns with the help of BraceMate.  It is the best app to accompany braces!

The BraceMate app features several main functions.

Colour picker:  A realistic teeth image that allows you to choose the colour on your braces with a full range of colours available.  A share function has been enabled so that you can let you orthodontist know in advance what colours you want, so they can make sure they have the colours available for you.
Information on how to look after your braces throughout treatment to ensure your experience with braces are as hassle free as possible.
Information on how to manage emergencies with braces should they arise.

More Information
The Colour picker
It has an easy-to-use screen that lets users see how their braces look with different patterns, and multiple colours.  Some apps have a cartoony picture of teeth that makes it hard to visualize what your braces will look like.  BraceMate shows you a life like picture to make it as real as possible.  Some other apps only let you see how the teeth look with only one set of colours at a time.  The BraceMate app lets you see how your teeth look with different patterns of colours.  You can support your team, or national colours.  You can match your outfit for your next social event.

The Share function enables you to send pictures to your orthodontist to save you the time when you are at the appointment, and, lets you pick your colours at your own pace.  The share function also lets you forward your proposed colour design to your friends who can let you know if the colours are right for you.

There is easy-to-read maintenance information to help you look after your smile during your treatment.  The better your teeth are maintained, the quicker your treatment and, the better your smile will look when treatment has finished.

The easy-to-read emergency information is a comprehensive list of possible problems that could occur during braces treatment.  It is a handy guide for all the matters that could concern you when you can not get a hold of your orthodontist.

And lastly, this is a free app, made by professionals, for patients.  The goal is to provide better outcomes for all involved.  Quicker treatment times, happier patients, and, happier orthodontists.

Includes colour selections for:
‚Ä¢AB Orthodontics
‚Ä¢American Orthodontics

If you are an orthodontist and wish to contact the developers for your own customised app please visit www.bracemateapp.com

The Share function enables you to send pictures to your orthodontist to save you the time when you are at the appointment, and, lets you pick your colours at your own pace. The share function also lets you forward your proposed colour design to your friends who can let you know if the colours are right for you.

There is easy-to-read maintenance information to help you look after your smile during your treatment. The better your teeth are maintained, the quicker your treatment and, the better your smile will look when treatment has finished.

The easy-to-read emergency information is a comprehensive list of possible problems that could occur during braces treatment. It is a handy guide for all the matters that could concern you when you can not get a hold of your orthodontist.

And lastly, this is a free app, made by professionals, for patients. The goal is to provide better outcomes for all involved. Quicker treatment times, happier patients, and, happier orthodontists.

Includes colour selections for:
‚Ä¢AB Orthodontics
‚Ä¢American Orthodontics

If you are an orthodontist and wish to contact the developers for your own customised app please visit www.bracemateapp.com
summary: Make braces more exciting by creating patterns with BraceMate.

title: Oral Pathology Quiz Exam
description:
Oral Pathology Quiz Exam

Key Features of this APP: 
‚Ä¢ At practice mode you can see the explanation describing the correct answer.
‚Ä¢ Real exam style full mock exam with timed interface
‚Ä¢ Ability to create own quick mock by choosing the number of MCQ‚Äôs.
‚Ä¢ You can create your profile and see your result history with just one click.
‚Ä¢ This app contains large number of question set that covers all syllabus area.

Oral and maxillofacial pathology (also termed oral pathology, stomatognathic disease, dental disease, or mouth disease) refers to the diseases of the mouth ("oral cavity" or "stoma"), jaws ("maxillae" or "gnath") and related structures such as salivary glands, temporomandibular joints, facial muscles and perioral skin (the skin around the mouth). The mouth is an important organ with many different functions. It is also prone to a variety of medical and dental disorders.

The specialty oral and maxillofacial pathology is concerned with diagnosis and study of the causes and effects of diseases affecting the oral and maxillofacial region. It is sometimes considered to be a specialty of dentistry and pathology Sometimes the term head and neck pathology is used instead, but this might imply that the pathologist deals with otorhinolaryngologic disorders (i.e. ear, nose and throat) in addition to maxillofacial disorders. In this role there is some overlap between the expertise of head and neck pathologists and that of endocrine pathologists.

Disclaimer:
This applications just is an excellent tool for self study and exam preparation. It's not affiliated with or endorsed by any testing organization, certificate, test name or trademark.

title: Dentist Manager: patient organiser software
description:
Dentistry manager is a software that is made for professional dentists.
This is an irreplaceable organizer, which is always at hand.

Here are some key posibilities of this application:

* Creation of a list of patients (each patient has its own profile).
* The patient profile contains any information you need to keep in mind (such as: detailed treatment history, photographs, digital Xrays, planned visits, etc.).
* Any additional information/procedure will be instanly displayed on the patient's dental chart.
* For each visit you can choose the type of procedure, the cost of treatment, the time of visit.
* In the application there is a calendar in which all scheduled visits related to patients will be displayed.
* You can export the patient health history profile with all the information and transfer it to your colleague.
* You can import a patient profile and it will appear in your database.
* You can export the calendar of all upcoming visits and procedures to be performed and send it to the administrator of the clinic.

Use the navigation menu from the top for quick access to the calendar, your patients, task scheduling.
This application was designed for maximum speed and usability.
We are constantly updatinf the Dentist Manager application, so leave your wishes for new features in the comments.

title: Dental Record - Management app for modern dentists
description:
Dental Record is an Android App designed for dentists and oral health professionals. 

Increase the efficiency and productivity of your business managing most tasks easily without compromises. Dental Record provides several modules adapted to international standards.

Key Features:
* Manage Patients and their Medical History. We provide detailed forms.
* Fully manage the Tooth-Chart or Diagram:
- Manage permanent and primary dentition simultaneously. 
- Support for 3 Numbering Systems (Universal, FDI and Palmer).
- Support Color highlighting by sections that allow you to set several attributes, annotations and coded tasks (ideal for budgets based on proposed treatment).
-  Every tooth includes basic information. 
* Manage Appointments, Payments and Tasks.
* Set reference prices for every task.
* Measure your performance with Stats and Reports that include dynamic filtering capability. 
* Handle several specialists and clinics at the same time.
* Multi Language: English, Spanish and Portuguese. We will add more languages soon.
* The User Interface is very intuitive and optimized for tablets.
* It's safe; you can create backups at any time.
* Order lists (Patients & Appointments) 

PRO Exclusive Features:
* Access to primary dentition in the Diagram.
* Access to Statistics (Charts), save as PNG.
* Up to 10 images per patient
* Customize Medical History template.
* AD-FREE (No Advertisements).

Please remember to Review our App. Your comments will help us to improve at a faster pace!

You can easily contribute to make this App even better! Just send us any request, bug report, idea or language issue to app.dev.coders@gmail.com  

Do you want to help us to translate ‚ÄòDental Record‚Äô to your language? It‚Äôs easy, just find us on http://ackuna.com/translate-/dental-record and contribute.

Notes: 
* This app is free to download but it requires a paid upgrade for full functionality. Your support is a guarantee for periodical updates.
* This app is designed as standalone software; we won‚Äôt provide a way to sync the data with 3th party software.

Permissions:
- Internet access: LITE version is Ad-Supported by Google AdMob. 
- In-app-purchase: Allows the user to upgrade to the PRO version.
- Access to Storage: Allows you to create backups of your database.

title: Tooth Decay Tips
description:
People are exposed every day to foods and beverages that take a toll on your teeth. Even with the best oral hygiene, your teeth will always suffer from some sort of demineralization, which leads to decay. If you want to reverse your tooth decay, there are some natural and home remedies that can help you.
Here are some simple ways you can naturally treat it. Try Oil Pulling. Brush With Baking Soda. Use Hydrogen Peroxide. Use Apple Cider Vinegar. . Prevent Tooth Stains Before They Happen. Don't Underestimate the Value of Brushing and Flossing.

In this app you will find all the tips and remedies you need.
Thank you for supporting us by putting the 5 stars

title: Dentistry Today App
description:
Dentistry Today is the leading clinical news publication in dentistry, reaching more than 130,000 dental professionals each month. Dentistry Today delivers exciting and informative content across the globe with the hopes of helping dentists, hygienists, dental assistants, and lab technicians to better their practices and patients. Dentistry Today brings the latest news on innovative products and technology in the dental industry. Well-respected and high-profile leaders in the dental community desire to write for the publication. It also provides continuing education courses for dentists to maintain their state-mandated CE credits. Dentistry Today provides the information everyone needs about dentistry, including clinical articles, product information, videos, and much more content. This app offers easy access to Dentistry Today on iPhone and iPad.

Features
‚ÄîArticles: view all Dentistry Today clinical articles that appear in the magazine as well as other dental news stories.
‚ÄîCE Courses: Look up and take all CE courses that Dentistry Today offers.
‚ÄîDigital Edition: View our archive of issues right from your iPhone or iPad.
‚ÄîProducts: See all of the newest and innovative dental products available. Featuring product specials, techniques, new products, top products, and announcements.
‚ÄîLive Event Coverage: See what‚Äôs happening live from the show floor of any major dental meeting. Featuring exclusive product offers, video interviews, and product demonstrations.
‚ÄîVideos: Clinical videos showing the latest techniques and dental products.
‚ÄîVendor: Custom feature to allow dentists to take advantage of product promotions.

title: Brushing Hero
description:
Brushing Teeth becomes an entertainment

This game makes children enjoy brushing teeth.
Once you hold a toothbrush and face the camera, you will be transformed into a hero with iron war helmet on.
You can attack the monsters by brushing your teeth.
Aiming to let children get into the habit of brushing their teeth neatly, we made this app to level up the attack power as you brush your teeth from various angles.

Makes you want to try over and over

After playing the game, you will get "hero cards" depending on how many coins you acquired, and can level up your attack power. You will be able to beat more monsters. 
This app supports your mind to brush your teeth proactively by a simple rule that the more you play, the stronger you will be, and go to the next stage.

If you beat dragons that appear every 30 stages, you'll get a new gorgeous hero helmet!
descriptionHTML:
Brushing Teeth becomes an entertainment

This game makes children enjoy brushing teeth.
Once you hold a toothbrush and face the camera, you will be transformed into a hero with iron war helmet on.
You can attack the monsters by brushing your teeth.
Aiming to let children get into the habit of brushing their teeth neatly, we made this app to level up the attack power as you brush your teeth from various angles.

Makes you want to try over and over

After playing the game, you will get "hero cards" depending on how many coins you acquired, and can level up your attack power. You will be able to beat more monsters.
This app supports your mind to brush your teeth proactively by a simple rule that the more you play, the stronger you will be, and go to the next stage.

If you beat dragons that appear every 30 stages, you'll get a new gorgeous hero helmet!
summary: Brushing Teeth becomes an entertainment! A New Wave Toothbrushing RPG
recentChanges: Removed in-app purchases and made all content free.
comments: It's okay. Fun to watch your soldiers kill the monsters. A few problems, though. Game does not offer instruction on how to clean your teeth. If you change position while brushing, the camera easily loses you. If it loses you, it doesn't pause. My son was getting really frustrated because he was brushing his teeth properly, but the app lost his face and time ran out. Not a bad app, but there are better apps out there to encourage good brushing habits.

UPDATE: After using this a bit, the limited duration of the timer (not a full 2 minutes, as recommended by dentists) and the prizes when hitting every 30 levels, means my child aggressively brushes just the front or sides of her teeth the whole time to reach these impossible higher levels. I wish it had some indicators to help children want to brush all of their teeth, as she just brushes the sides of her teeth (not the occlusal chewing (top) parts). Would be a 5* game with these additions.

OMG!! I had my 6y.o. daughter giggling and smiling, and she brushed her teeth twice in succession! What a life saver! She has always been a hesitant brusher with tantrums and meltdowns galore, but tonight OMG, thank you so much!!! She's looking forward to eating brekky (another battle) just so she can go brush her teeth again- did I say thank you?! THANK YOU!!!

Super fun for the kids- for some reason it registered really well when my son was playing, but when my daughter brushes, it doesn't register her brushes. She hated seeing her brother so successful and vanquishing so many Monsters when she tried so hard and couldn't. I'd love some hints- the fact that she is toothless for her front two teeth? The color of a toothbrush? Any ideas on how to help her? Otherwise, super fun and creative app. Kids love it and love bushing their teeth!!

Must try for fussy brushers! Now my 7yo son looks forward to brushing! Would love to have the ability to change duration and also guide kids where to brush so that its more effective. But otherwise great work! Thanks!

title: Children's doctor: dentist
description:
Lovely guys, there are professions in the world that it is hard to get along without. This is a fireman and a driver, a lifeguard and a police officer and many others. But today we suggest you try yourself in the role of an unusual doctor. After all, everyone knows why brushing your teeth after eating is so important. Do you know what a real dentist does? And here is the most important question. What to do if your tooth hurts? And all these questions have an answer! If your tooth hurts badly, then only a wonderful dentist can help you. And before going to the hospital to treat your teeth, we suggest playing our new game from the series of educational games for children - ¬´Dentist." This will help get rid of fear and insecurity before making an appointment with the doctor of this wonderful specialty.
In our new exciting game you will manage a real hospital, and it‚Äôs not some, but a dental one. And every day you will have to see many patients - funny animals. All of them have the only problem - their teeth hurt. And all of them you need to accept and provide medical care. And actually you have such a unique opportunity. Using modern medical tools, you can help your little patients. Save your four-legged pets from caries, treat them with teeth and gums. Put the seals and clean the plaque. Remove bad teeth and put braces on them. Help them to get rid of the evil germs and bad smell. Make their teeth healthy and smiles radiant! After all treating animals and caring for them is very exciting and interesting! Our children's hospital is waiting for you! Prove to everyone that you are the best doctor in the world.

Visit our website: http://yovogames.com
Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZruadkJJTuD4Bgb1F6pa3A
Twitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudio
Facebook: https://facebook.com/yovogames

title: Dentist Pet Clinic Kids Games
description:
Does your kid love pets , animals and want to be a dentist ?
If your child want to play in the Dentist Pet Clinic you have found the right educational game !
Be a dentist at this pet doctor clinic ! 
Treat patients with professional doctor tools like syringes, dental tweezers and more!
This dentist‚Äôs office is so much fun !

These pets need your help ! Choose from 4 adorable patients and let the doctor fun begin!
Treat patients at the office with doctor tools like mouth spray, dental pliers !
Brush dirty teeth, pull teeth, fight bacteria and so much more!

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination in the world of dental clinic.

Dentist Pet Clinic is simple and fun : 
* Open the game and choose the animal that you wish to cure
* choose from different dental instruments to treat the pet baby
* fight bacteria to prevent tooth decay !
* Shine up their teeth with a toothbrush !
* apply dental treatment, remove cavities and horrible germs
* Destroy bacteria with lasers and microscope, pluck teeth
* tap the arrow button to change scene

Can you help these adorable pets in this pet doctor game ? 

Dentist Pet Clinic is a must have app for kids. Features:
-game for toddlers and kids from ages 2-13 years old
-Promotes problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination
-4 cute pet babies to choose from: panda, cat, dog, horse
-a lot of dentist tools to treat the pet baby illness
-Puppy Pet babies will have various expressions and sounds when you are treating them
-tools to get rid of cavities
-X-ray machine used to take X-ray of tooth
-Apply Injection on tooth
-Tooth removal to remove bad teeth
-Cotton used to rub on tooth
-Wash tooth using Shower
-In the final Paint view you can even design your character !

Have fun with BATOKI !

title: Dental Anesthesia - SecondLook
description: The SecondLook‚Ñ¢ Dental Anesthesia application is a study aid for learners of the dental sciences to self-test their level of knowledge about anesthetic procedures used in standard dentistry. This app covers the following topics: Maxillary Nerve Blocks; Mandibular Nerve Blocks; Akinosi and Gow-Gates Blocks; Calculations and Complications; and Intrapulpal, Periodontal Ligament (PDL) and Infiltration Injections. These procedures are reviewed in a stepwise fashion including potential complications and limitations, as well as different anesthetic agents and dosage calculations.

title: Little Lovely Dentist
description:
Lots of people want to be a great dentist. Is that your dream? Now you get a chance to treat those poor patients at the clinic in this dentist game!

Patients are lining up outside. Let's start to check patients' teeth/tooth problems. They suffer from kinds of teeth problems such as bad teeth, tooth decay, dental calculus and more. Extract their teeth carefully without hurting them. Treat patients with pretty cool doctor tools such as mouth spray, dental pliers, syringes, dental tweezers, braces and more! It's a very funny game for people to practice for the creative ability and the sense of accomplishment!

Features:
* More than 12 lovely characters in the game, they have crazy teeth problems and are waiting for you.
* Provide abundant teeth cleaning tools, color painting brush and kinds of lovely teeth stickers to make you be a great dentist.
* Featuring picture capturing and rating to let you see your work at the first moment.
* Not only a dentist game but also a class full of knowledge to help you develop a good habit of protecting teeth. It also teaches you how to be a great dentist!

You can not only turn yourself into a professional dentist, diagnose and cure different patients, but also can operate and decorate your own dental clinic to make it be the dream one. There is so much fun in this amazing game! You've never been in a dentist's office like this!

title: RadioXtudy
description:
This app aims to assist graduate students in dentistry and dental surgeons in the study of radiographic interpretation.
The RadioXtudy presents an organized, direct and functional interface, containing topics divided didactically to the study, include:
‚Ä¢ Anatomy
‚Ä¢ Pathology
‚Ä¢ Dental anomalies

The app also includes an interactive area between users, as well as exercises for fixing the studied content!

title: Dentalkart - Online Dental Store
description:
Dentalkart : Dental Products Online at Best Price 
Dentalkart is the worlds largest online dental shopping store. It is one stop shop to cater to all dental need which includes Dental equipments, materials, instruments, endodontic files, composites, Resins, Cements, Impression materials, Endomotors, Handpieces, compressors, Chairs, UV Chambers, autoclaves and many more from various categories like endodontic, orthodontic, prosthodontic, restoratives, oral surgery, General Dentistry, periodontics, paedodontics, implantology etc.
We have the widest range of Dental Brands : waldent, woodpecker, GC, 3M Espe, W&H, Mani, Ivoclar Vivadent, GDC, API, Zhermack, Ammdent, Prevest, J Morita, Apple, Being Foshan, NSK  and more.


 Install Dentalkart : Best Dental Products App 
Download Android App on your device and create your account. Now you will be shown homepage screen where you will find all Dental categories including Amazing offers, deals and discounts under Offer Zone, Endodontics, Orthodontics, Prosthodontics, General Dentistry, Equipments, Oral Surgery, Periodontics, Paedodontics and implantology.

 Our Vision 
 Our vision is to make most reliable and friction-less Dental e-commerce shopping portal that creates life changing experience for the Dentists.

Why Dentalkart?
1. 25000+ Genuine Dental Products at competitive price all over the world.
2. With Dentalkart app, no need to worry about the quality of the product or wasting time on cost negotiations. You are always assured of premium standards.
3. Get notified for new product arrival.
4. The simple design layout and easy-to-use nature of the app makes the User experience even better. You can look at your past orders and even form a wish-list of products you want to watch out for.


 Features of Dentalkart 
1. Dynamic Search : Type in the product in 'Search' tab and find the best results.
2. Video demonstration, description, and features of products are available.
3. For placing order you can choose among the payment options like cash on delivery(only in india), credit/debit cards, net banking, EMI and paytm.
4. Track your orders inside the app, get personalized notifications on offers, order status, new arrivals and upcoming sale events.


 Enjoy Secured and Safe Shopping 
All your transactions are securely processed on Dentalkart.
Dentalkart provides you 100% purchase protection for safe payments.

title: Dental Hygiene Academy - Seminar Edition
description:
Dental Hygiene Academy Seminar app is exclusively for students/users who have registered and attended a Dental Hygiene Academy Board Review seminar at www.DentalHygieneAcademy.com.

Please be sure you have registered at https://www.dentalhygieneacademy.com/registration/ to get Dental Hygiene Academy pin number to access this app.

Please enter your registered email address and DHA PIN Number to verify that you have already registered and attended a Dental Hygiene Academy Board Review seminar at www.DentalHygieneAcademy.com.

After verifying email address and DHA PIN Number, please signup to create your account and login into app.

recentChanges: Enjoy our latest updates where we have fixed minor bugs and improved performance of our apps to provide you a seamless board review experience.
comments: Never saves my timers or any of my progress, I'm really disappointed with this after how much I spent on the board review.

I would leave 0 stars but that is not possible. The app doesn't work for Samsung phones and I have reported it numerous times with no responses from them. When I attended the seminar I informed Andy of the issue and he was aware it wasn't working for Samsung users and said they were working on the issue and it would be working in a few days. That's was over 3 weeks ago. I have boards In a month...this sucks!!!

Unable to use app, get kicked out of anything I try to do. Spoke with Andy who said there was a fix for android or Samsung users and should be pushed out in a few days, that was over a week ago and still doesn't work. Very frustrating!

App doesnt work at all, crashes every time i try to answer a questions. Reported it every time for a couple of weeks, then emailed them, now im doing this cause they have not responded or updated anything and now im getting really frustrated. The review is tomorrow, and boards are in 2 months

This app is great if you have an iPhone, but the same cannot be said for Android users. App keeps crashing every time I (or my classmates who also use a Samsung) click on an answer to a test question. Pretty please fix this asap!

title: Toothache: Causes, Diagnosis, and Management
description:
Toothache, also known as dental pain, is pain in the teeth or their supporting structures, caused by dental diseases or pain referred to the teeth by non-dental diseases. When severe it may impact sleep, eating, and other daily activities.
Common causes include inflammation of the pulp, usually in response to tooth decay, dental trauma, or other factors, dentin hypersensitivity, apical periodontitis (inflammation of the periodontal ligament and alveolar bone around the root apex), dental abscesses (localized collections of pus, alveolar osteitis ("dry socket", a possible complication of tooth extraction), acute necrotizing ulcerative gingivitis (a gum infection), temporomandibular disorder.
==========================
APP FEATURES
==========================
This exclusive app will help to understand the Toothache Guide, Toothache Disease Management & Toothache Disease causes.
Here are features that make this app better than all other Toothache Disease apps - 
-	UI of app is very user responsive and easy to navigate. 
-	Easily Change the page.
-	Data of app is collected from various research reports.
-	You can access these favorites whenever you want.
-	Share your favorite benefits with your friends and family through email, SMS, Twitter, Facebook, and WhatsApp.

All these features are available for free. 

==========================
SAY HELLO
==========================
Any medical information published on this app is not intended as a substitute for informed medical advice and you should not take any action before consulting with a healthcare professional. Our team are nonstop working hard on creation this app. Please feel free to review and email us for any questions/suggestions/complications.

title: BruxApp
description:
NOT COMPATIBLE WITH ANDROID 10, FOR NOW

WHAT IS BRUXAPP?
BruxApp is the first globally available, research-based smartphone app dedicated to the study and management of Bruxism and its health consequences.
Designed by top international experts in a multi-center Bruxism research project and developed in 25 Research Centres across the world. 

WHAT CAN IT DO?
Bruxapp is a simple tool used by dentists and patients for several purposes:
- To help dentists to diagnose the possible presence/absence of bruxism-related activities (i.e., teeth clenching or grinding, jaw clenching) and potential consequences
- For rating the severity of bruxism, if present
- As a biofeedback-based therapeutic tool for bruxism
- To increase patients‚Äô awareness of bruxism activities so they can avoid or correct negative habits
- To promote cutting-edge knowledge about bruxism, based on the latest scientific research
- To make patients aware of the possible clinical consequences of bruxism and try to prevent them

WHY is BruxApp needed? 
Bruxism has been increasing in prevalence over recent years. It encompasses motor activities of the jaw muscles, such as jaw or teeth clenching, and teeth grinding, some of which may be associated with clinical signs and symptoms, like tooth wear, failed dental restorations, complications with implant-supported prosthesis, muscle fatigue and temporomandibular joint pain. A correct diagnosis is therefore fundamental to establishing early prevention and management regimens.

SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH
Studies with BruxApp have been supervised by experts, as part of an ongoing multicenter research project on bruxism epidemiology and management coordinated by Prof. Daniele Manfredini, University of Siena, Italy.

DEVELOPMENT
The app was developed by Goran Djukic, program analyst at the Institute of Clinical Physiology, National Council of Research, University of Pisa, Italy.
BruxApp is currently available in the following languages: English, Italian, Portuguese, German, Spanish, French, Dutch, Finnish, Brazilian, Japanese, Hebrew, Chinese, Arabic, Polish, Romanian, Norwegian, Lithuanian, Bosnian,Croatian and Turkish with another 8 language versions soon to be released. 

IMPORTANT STATEMENT
BruxApp is not a game or gadget.  In order for BruxApp to work correctly and be effective, please dedicate 10 minutes of your time to READING the simple instructions CAREFULLY. 

The full Brux-App compatibility is guaranteed by Android 6 and higher ones but not for Android 10

title: Teeth whitening (Guide)
description:
What Is It?

Tooth whitening lightens teeth and helps to remove stains and discoloration. Whitening is among the most popular cosmetic dental procedures because it can greatly improve how your teeth look. Most dentists perform tooth whitening.

Whitening is not a one-time procedure. It will need to be repeated from time to time if you want to maintain the brighter color.

What It's Used For

The outer layer of a tooth is called the enamel. The color of natural teeth is created by the reflection and scattering of light off the enamel, combined with the color of the dentin under it. Your genes affect the thickness and smoothness of the enamel. Thinner enamel allows more of the color of the dentin to show through. Having smoother or rougher enamel also affects the reflection of light and therefore the color.

Every day, a thin coating (pellicle) forms on the enamel and picks up stains. Tooth enamel also contains pores that can hold stains.

title: Yellow Teeth - Cause and Treatment
description:
IMPORTANT:
*Users who have APKs with previous version, may need to receive android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE permission*

_________________


This app contains about Yellow Teeth. Learn everything and you will find tips and knowledge to know causes, treatments, effects and many more..

Though not as urgent as other dental conditions, yellow teeth can cost you your confidence and willingness to smile every day. Luckily, improving the color of your teeth can be as simple as changing what you eat and drink while polishing your oral care routine. You may even benefit from whitening treatment by your dentist.


In this app, we will disscuss the following topics:

‚Ä¢ Yellow Teeth: How To Make Your Smile Natural White Again
‚Ä¢ Home Remedies to Get Rid of Yellow Teeth
‚Ä¢ All You've Ever Wanted to Know About Teeth Whitening
‚Ä¢ Why Do Teeth Turn Yellow?
‚Ä¢ These Habits Are Making Your Teeth Yellow: Here's What To Do
‚Ä¢ Yellow Teeth: What Causes Them & Do You Need to Worry About it?
‚Ä¢ Busting 6 Myths About Teeth Yellowing
‚Ä¢ Does Vaping Cause Yellow Teeth?
‚Ä¢ Yellow Teeth - An Inconvenient Physical Attribute
‚Ä¢ Yellow Teeth Whitening Techniques

And much more..


[ Features ]

- Easy & simple guide book app
- Periodic update of contents
- Support Offline Database 
- Shareable contents
- You can ask questions from our experts
- Send us your suggestions and we will add it


A little words about Yellow Teeth:

It is everyone's desire to look good all the time. A great smile will surely contribute to that and we cannot avoid smiles at all times. When you have yellow teeth, it may not be so pleasing to offer smiles to everyone you comes across. Therefore a discolored smile can be undesirable to look at and at times you may not get the same smile. This condition can make you lose your confidence and become irritated by your own smile. This may even prompt someone to keep on hiding his/her teeth. And this might not be possible a hundred percent and that is why we should know what causes yellow teeth so that we do not fall into that category.

Some people have naturally discolored teeth while others obtain them from various kinds of food. These may include tea, coffee and wine which may contribute entirely to yellowing of your teeth. Smoking is also a major cause because of the large puffs of smoke which emanate from the smokers mouth and this is a major cause of yellow teeth. Poor oral hygiene maintenance is another cause of discolored teeth and those who fail to take good care of their teeth may fall into this category. Teeth can also become yellow with age. As you age up, your teeth do not appear as white as when you were a small child with milk teeth. Aging even results to wearing down of the enamel of the teeth and this increases the change in teeth color.

Even as we try to find out more about what causes yellow teeth, the consumptions we make daily may also be a leading factor in change teeth color. Medications may be another factor resulting to this condition. Elements such as tetracycline, antipsychotic and those of high blood pressure are a good example of the drugs which aid in yellowing our teeth. This is because they contain certain chemicals which speed up teeth decay and as we consume these drugs time by time, the chemicals accumulate more resulting to yellowing of the teeth. Even chemicals found in mouth washes and mouth rinses also contain elements which may result to yellowing of teeth. These may contain elements of chlorhexidine and cetylpyridium which constitute of the chemicals in these mouth washes. A little bit of usage is not bad but continual usage over a long period of time may cause your teeth to start turning colour.


Download Yellow Teeth app now to read more..

title: Dental hygienist
description:
"The American Dental Hygienists Association (ADHA) defines dental hygienists as oral health professionals who are responsible for preventing and treating oral diseases. Regardless of the state in which they practice, dental hygienists must be state licensed, which requires graduating from a college or university dental hygienist program and passing a written national board examination and state clinical examination.

Unlike dental assistants, whose job duties must generally be performed under the direct supervision of a licensed dentist, dental hygienists perform much of their work independently, with only general supervision from a licensed dentist.
Dental hygienists are an important part of dentist-led teams. Their work removes a considerable burden from the dentist, freeing up the dentist to perform more advanced procedures. Therefore, it is quite common for dental hygienists to perform many of the preventive dental procedures in an office, such as teeth cleaning and fluoride application."

title: Teeth Whitening
description:
Tooth whitening lightens teeth and helps to remove stains and discoloration. Whitening is among the most popular cosmetic dental procedures because it can greatly improve how your teeth look. Most dentists perform tooth whitening. 
Whitening is not a one-time procedure. It will need to be repeated from time to time if you want to maintain the brighter color. 
Tooth whitening can be a very effective way of lightening the natural colour of your teeth without removing any of the tooth surface. It cannot make a complete colour change, but it may lighten the existing shade.
The best ways to naturally whiten Your Teeth protect your crown, wisdom teeth and root canal.
Teeth Whitening App Features:

‚Ä¢	What Causes Teeth to Look Yellow?
‚Ä¢	Ways to Naturally Whiten Your Teeth.
‚Ä¢	Make Your Teeth Whiter.
‚Ä¢	Teeth Whitening Products.
‚Ä¢	Whiter Teeth Naturally.
Install Teeth Whitening App and learn all about teeth whitening methods to have a magical smile.

title: 3D Dental Implant
description:
INTRODUCTION

Asia Implant has over 2 decades of experience in dental care industry, providing exciting products for dental implants, aesthetic restorations, full arch rehabilitations and 3D technologies; to effectively help dentists and patients, with regular to almost ‚Äúimpossible cases‚Äù to better experience their teeth and smiles again.

Meet our founder Raymond Loh. A hands-on implant specialist with more than 28 years case planning and design experience. Raymond has been responsible for bringing dental implant know-how, guided surgery and immediate teeth concepts for clients not only in Singapore but throughout the ASEAN region. He has been recognised for his work in continuing dental education in post graduate dental studies from University of Michigan USA, University of Genoa Italy, National University of Singapore, Moestopo University Indonesia, Centro Escolar University Philippines, University of Technology MARA Malaysia and many others. When Raymond isn‚Äôt busy educating people on the ‚Äúwhat, when and how of dental implants‚Äù, he can be found taking part in music groups and health related outdoor activities.

We collaborate with dental manufacturers and laboratories to create memorable 3D experiences for doctors with their set of implant skills and patients with their new set of teeth. Think of us as an innovative partner than a resource. This means we have shared perspective on how we can work together to achieve your goals of aesthetics and function in bringing about beautiful smiles.

title: Healthy Teeth Care Tips (Guide)
description:
"Healthy Teeth and Mouth Care Tips!

Remember how your mother used to tell you almost everything you did was ""bad for your teeth?"" You may have forgotten some of her warnings.

Brushing your teeth every morning and night doesn't guarantee you're giving your mouth all the attention it needs. Even a regular oral hygiene routine could be leaving gaps if you engage in a few not so great habits with your time at the sink. 

By understanding proper brushing technique and ensuring you have the right tools in your cabinet, you can make sure you have all of your bases covered when pursuing a more thorough clean. Consider the following dental hygiene tips to help you take your care routine to the next level."

title: Quick Dental Guide
description:
This App is designed to comprehensively introduce basic instruments and concepts to Dental Hygienist, Dental Assistants ,  Dental Nurses, Technical Trainee  enrolled under National Skill Development Corporation and other programmes.

It can also serve as a quick reference for Dental Students and Interns for Last Minute Revision of Dental Instruments.

It includes the following topics

1.Dental Anatomy and Common Dental Diseases
2.Periodontics
3.Orthodontics
4.Oral Surgery
5.Restorative Dentistry
6.Sterilization and Bio Medical Waste Management
7.Recent News
8.Blog

title: Maxillofacial & Oral Pathology
description:
Oral & maxillofacial pathology:

Get +3000 Study notes, exam quizzes, terms & definitions and Prepare & Pass Your Exam easily to guarantee the highest score.

With this app you can learn on the Go, Anytime & Everywhere. The learning & understanding process never been so easy like with our 5 study modes embedded in this app.

This app is a combination of sets, containing practice questions and study cards, terms & concepts for self learning & exam preparation on the topic of medicine.

Our Learners get the best, that's why they don't just meet standards, They exceed them.

By the end of this app we expect that you expand your knowledge, widen your expertise, improve your practical skills and Broaden your academic & career horizons.

We promise that this app will strengthen your self-confidence during the exam & daily work.

Get the Skills you need to land the job you want.

Learn & educate your self as much as you can, knowledge is the real and best capital & assets that you own.

Invest in your Success Now. Your investment in knowledge, professionalism & expertise is durable & with a High value added. It's a High return investment.

Oral and maxillofacial pathology (also termed oral pathology, stomatognathic disease, dental disease, or mouth disease) refers to the diseases of the mouth ("oral cavity" or "stoma"), jaws ("maxillae" or "gnath") and related structures such as salivary glands, temporomandibular joints, facial muscles and perioral skin (the skin around the mouth). The mouth is an important organ with many different functions. It is also prone to a variety of medical and dental disorders.

The specialty oral and maxillofacial pathology is concerned with diagnosis and study of the causes and effects of diseases affecting the oral and maxillofacial region. It is sometimes considered to be a specialty of dentistry and pathology Sometimes the term head and neck pathology is used instead, but this might imply that the pathologist deals with otorhinolaryngologic disorders (i.e. ear, nose and throat) in addition to maxillofacial disorders. In this role there is some overlap between the expertise of head and neck pathologists and that of endocrine pathologists.

You will get better understanding, less preparation time & a better score in the exam.

This app is also suitable for students, researchers, resident, doctors, Anatomy & physiology specialists, nurses and medical professionals and of course Medical lecturers, teachers and professors.
Get a better score in your USMLE (step1, step2 CS & CK), PANCE, MCAT, DAT, COMLEX,CNA, OAT, NBDE, or PCAT exam, and the most important is to fall in love with the Dental & oral material, it worth all the attention.
National League for Nursing Pre-Admission Exam (NLN PAX-RN/PN)
Test of Essential Academic Skills (TEAS)
Health Occupations Basic Entrance Test (HOBET)
Health Education Systems, Inc Exam (HESI) A2
Psychological Services Bureau Registered Nursing School Aptitude Exam
Psychological Services Bureau Aptitude for Practical Nursing Exam

This educational & medical application is intended to NP, CNA, PAX, RN, and also for:
ANP - Adult Nurse Practitioner
FNP - Family Nurse Practitioner
A-GNP - Adult-Gero Primary Nurse Practitioner
ANP-BC Adult Nurse Practitioner
FNP-BC Family Nurse Practitioner
PNP-BC Pediatric Nurse Practitioner
ACNP-BC Acute Care Nurse Practitioner
GNP - BC Gerontological Nurse Practitioner
PMHNP-BC Adult Psychiatric and Mental Health Nurse Practitioner
PMHNP-BC Family Psychiatric and Mental Health Nurse Practitioner
CNRN¬Æ
SCRN¬Æ
and also for USMLE, COMLEX, ANCC Certification Center, TEAS, HESI A2, NET, DET, PSB/HOAE, PAX-RN, HOBET, PAX RN, PSB. Hestotechnician, phlebotomist, CDM, Hospice and Palliative, Medical Surgical.

title: Crazy Kids Dentist - Live Surgery Dentist Hospital
description:
Each one of these patients is having a big problem with their teeth. Do you think that you can help them regain their perfect smiles in this medical simulation game?

Some of the little kids had way too much candy and it is showing on their teeth. Help fight the germs, bad breath and pull the broken teeth from their little mouths. Remove the gum and those nasty plaque too. Can you assist the good dentist to have less of a crazy day? Help him and his patients smile again!

Can you take care of this kids patient? She‚Äôs got tons of cavities. After you treat her teeth and put braces on them, you can decorate them with stickers and all sorts of crazy colors in this cute medical game.

Become a dentist and take care of your patients teeth! Use different tools to treat caries, bad breath and extract teeth. Play fun mini games and use the stethoscope hints in case you are stuck on your to-do list.

Features:
- Choose from 4 adorable patients! 
- Tons of different levels and activities to play.
- Includes dozens of awesome mini-games.
- Fight bacteria to prevent tooth decay! 
- Scan the teeth to determine the condition .
- Clean it and remove cavities and fungus with medical equipment .
- Brush the teeth, clean it with water then suck out the extra water.
- lots of Dental tools commonly seen in a clinic.

The program can not replace the personal professional judgment of the caries risk.

This tool is meant for Dentists, Dental Assistants, Dental Hygienist, and related dental healthcare professionals.

title: Gingivitis Disease
description: Gingivitis is a non-destructive disease that occurs around the teeth. The most common form of gingivitis, and the most common form of periodontal disease overall, is in response to bacterial biofilms (also called plaque) that is attached to tooth surfaces, termed plaque-induced gingivitis. While some cases of gingivitis never progress to periodontitis, data indicates that periodontitis is always preceded by gingivitis. Gingivitis is reversible with good oral hygiene; however, without treatment, gingivitis can progress to periodontitis, in which the inflammation of the gums results in tissue destruction and bone resorption around the teeth. Periodontitis can ultimately lead to tooth loss. The term means "inflammation of the gum tissue

title: Truthbrush
description:
Turn your toothbrush into a Truthbrush! 

The Truthbrush is a small, decorative device that fits easily on any manual or electric toothbrush. It allows you to track all tooth brush events and monitor the duration and coverage. We all know that brushing twice a day for two minutes is essential to your health. Children often brush for a short duration, miss coverage areas or simply forget to brush at all. You can't be with your kids for every brushing, Truthbrush can.  

With Truthbrush you can collect all brush event data seamlessly in the background. There is no start or stop button, it passively collects data so that you can view the trends over time. Truthbrush ends the "did you brush" argument and allows you to coach and reward your family to better oral oral health. According to the World Health Organization dental care is the most unmet healthcare need in children and adolescents. Poor brushing leads to increased dental visits, cavities, periodontal disease, discolored teeth and the loss of confidence that you get with a great smile. Studies have shown that bacteria in the mouth is related to heart disease, diabetes, pneumonia, and other serious health issues. Your families health is the most important thing in your life. Truthbrush makes it possible to keep track of your families toothbrush behavior and build great healthy habits.

The Truthbrush app shows daily toothbrush events and charts them over time. Understanding behavior and trends is critical to building great habits. The app displays the time of brushing, duration and coverage. Truthbrush knows the difference between brushing teeth, applying toothpaste and cleaning the brush. The app makes it easy to set goals and rewards, configure alerts and even share the brush event data with your dentist. Your dentist is a key partner in the health of your family. Truthbrush allows your dentist to check in and help without waiting for the six month visit. The app allows you to set the beep timer on the Truthbrush tracker for two minutes or any duration that you set. 

Key Features:
Track and monitor all brush behavior
Configurable beep timer
Weekly goals and rewards
Coverage analysis
Tips to guide better brushing 
Alerts and notifications
Performance report
Share data with your dentist

title: Teeth Whitening Tips

Everybody wants pearly, white teeth for a dazzling smile. title: All Dental Disease Guidelines
description:
All Dental Diseases are never any fun, but the good news is that most of them can be easily prevented. Brushing twice a day, flossing daily, eating properly, and regular dental check-ups are essential steps in preventing all dental disorders.

Educating yourself about common dental problems and their causes can go a long way in prevention. In this simple app you will learn about list of common dental disorders. 

Disclaimer : All Dental Disease Guidelines App is just for informational and education purposes, and are not a substitute for professional medical or health advice, examination, diagnosis, or treatment. This app disclaims any liability for the decisions you make based on this information.

title: Kitty Dental Caring
description:
You should be aware of the fact that taking care of a little cat implies a lot of responsibilities and for sure a lot of troubles, but in this animal game you'll learn step by step how is the proper method to approach this challenge and how satisfying can be at the end of the day. So to see for yourself the whole process we've made a complex and dynamic game in the name of vets all over the world. 
Take the position and act like a real professional doctor for animals. As a dentist you need to know the whole procedures so you could execute the special treatment this kitty requires. Look close to all devices you've got in there and make sure you use the proper one for each step. Clean the area and get off the dirt accumulated among teeth. Brush them well, kill the bacteria then replace the bad teeth with brand new ones. You've got the chance to create a healthy smooth tooth paste from natural ingredients to make her teeth more white, strong and shiny. 

Now the next part requires a little bit of imagination and for sure you need to go insane to think about how a kitty‚Äôs look would be. Put on a fancy sun glasses or some accessories to make her look fantastic. Practice your nursing skills and try something new when it comes to create funny aspects for animals. Get compassion and feel free to help this cat with her wounds and her fashion orientation.

There are many features this game brings in order to be your favorite: 
- Free and easy to play
- Joyful music and cool graphics
- Develop new abilities and improve the old one
- Become a doctor for animals and help them
- Alternative way to create a tooth paste from healthy ingredients
- Create a safe environment and a painless one
- Learn the art of dental care and try to be a designer too
- Take responsibilities and learn how to take care of a little baby cat

title: Cute Little Dentist
description:
A lot of kids want to pursue a career in dentistry so now they will get a chance to become a great dentist and help your patients to have a healthy mouth by playing this amazing dentist game.This game is more fun with a variety of tools to turn you into a professional dentist so you can perform different treatments on your patients.
There are lots of patients who have come to the dental clinic and waiting for their teeth treatment with lots of dental problems.

Using various medical instruments treat your patients and help them clean their teeth, fill their cavities, remove that plaque, kill gems and bacteria, pulling out broken teeth and replace them with the new once because oral health is very important

Features:

-  Lovely characters in the dentist office with lots of dental problems
-  Variety of dental tools to play with
-  Amazing different colours to give your teeth a better look
-  A range of stickers to decor your teeth

We all love to see people around us smiling but for a smile to be beautiful you need to take good care of your teeth. and such games teach how to protect their teeth and why it is necessary to clean them several times a day.

Specifically built for health care professionals, insights.MD is the easiest and securest way for medical professionals to discover, discuss, and share medical knowledge.

Join and connect with a community of over 160‚Äô000 verified doctors and medical professionals using insights.MD. Combining cutting-edge personalization algorithms with curation by Clinical Experts, INSIGHTS ensures that you are always up to date with the latest developments in your specialty.

COMBINING PERSONALIZATION WITH CURATION
	
Discovering knowledge that really matters is now easy. We‚Äôve combined hand-picked knowledge from renowned Clinical Experts, with personalization. title: Gum Disease Remedies
description:
Home remedies are a cheap and effective way to treat gingivitis. If you begin treatment at an early stage, home remedies are usually able to clear gingivitis.

It‚Äôs essential to treat the plaque before it becomes tartar. You may also wish to increase the frequency and duration of brushing and flossing.

Even though home remedies contain natural ingredients, you shouldn‚Äôt swallow them. Always buy high-quality products to use . It‚Äôs also a good idea to keep them refrigerated, especially if you live in a warmer climate.
This is some gum diseasesymptoms

    Red, swollen or tender gums or other pain in your mouth.
    Bleeding while brushing, flossing, or eating hard food.
    Gums that are receding or pulling away from the teeth, causing the teeth to look longer than before.
    Loose or separating teeth.
    Pus between your gums and teeth.
    Sores in your mouth.
    Persistent bad breath.

Plus‚Ä¶ Dowload and read to learn more.
In this app you will find all the tips and remedies you need.
Thank you for supporting us by putting the 5 stars

title: Whiteeth - scores your white teeth
description:
Find your teeth color easily. Know your teeth whiteness level.
This application detects the shade of your teeth and punctuates them.
Share the results with your friends and compare your score with theirs.

The score values range between: 0% and 100%

The average shade for a tooth is 40% with our system, this is considered a normal color and around 70% of the population have natural teeth which are within this range.

Instructions:

- Find a place with good lighting, preferably with natural light and during the day
- Center your face within the designated area
- Open your mouth and show your teeth fully
- After successful detection, the color will change to green. Wait a few seconds for the result


Note: this application is not intended to be used as a professional tool, only for recreational purposes.
