description:
Dental Assistant Exam Quiz 

Key Features of this APP: 
‚Ä¢ At practice mode you can see the explanation describing the correct answer.
‚Ä¢ Real exam style full mock exam with timed interface
‚Ä¢ Ability to create own quick mock by choosing the number of MCQ‚Äôs.
‚Ä¢ You can create your profile and see your result history with just one click.
‚Ä¢ This app contains large number of question set that covers all syllabus area.

DANB exams and certifications give you the opportunity to advance in your career; maintaining certification helps you stay current on new technologies and issues in the dental assisting profession.
Get a jump-start on your career and earn DANB‚Äôs NELDA certification. Learn more about eligibility requirements and the three component exams: Anatomy, Morphology and Physiology (AMP); Infection Control (ICE); and Radiation Health and Safety ( ).
Successful completion of the CDA exam will lead to a national certification that is highly valued by both employers and patients.

description:
Little teeth doctor is a simple FREE to play, neat educational game!

you are a special dentist who make people happy by taking care of their Oral health that enables their healthy & hygiene lifestyle!

Will you take up this challenge and save the townspeople from bad breath, tooth decay and many such problems with their teeth?

A lovely challenging app to develop kids motor skills, joyful visuals and colorful hand-eye coordination

Features:

* Easy instructions to help the youngest of kids!
* Several exciting medical tools to use in the clinic.
* Progress through various levels as you explore the town.
* Beautiful animated effects.
* Soft and soothing game music.
* Unlock more features as you play through free levels.
* FREE to play!

Win the hearts of the townsfolk with your own kind heart in this delightfully challenging and fun game!

2. Orange Peel
3. Strawberries
4. Lemon
5. Salt etc.

description:
Dental practice management software with SMS, reminders and bookkeeping. iDentist Premium app is designed for dentists to use daily in their professional activities.

iDentist app has the following features:

- Online syncing between all of your devices.
- The app can be simultaneously used by several doctors on multiple devices.
- A schedule of treatments that works best for you.
- Medical history of patients.
- Dental findings.
- X-rays gallery.

title: DentalChat
description: DentalChat is the leading and best dental chat platform where people connect to dentists to ask dental questions and seek dental advice. Get help online for dental emergencies, dental questions, or finding a local dentist. If you have a dental emergency we can search your area to find the best dental solution. DentalChat was created by dentists for clients in need of dental aid. We at DentalChat are leading the charge in teledentistry . DentalChat agents are certified dentist who can answer any of your dental questions.

title: Mr. Dentists
description:
Hey kids we all love when people around us like our friends and family smile. But for beautiful smile you need strong and clean teeth. Did you ever dreamed of becoming a super crazy dentist doctor in children's hospital? Make your dreams come true and you need to take good care of patients teeth.


In this crazy dentist clinic entertaining app, you need to take the role of best crazy dentist. Use all your dental skills to perform the fun treatment of decayed teeth. Your duty is help those poor patients and to bringing them back from shock and distress.

Features:
‚òÖ Select from 4 adorable patients! Cute Little Monsters and Adorable little kids
‚òÖ Fight bacteria to prevent tooth decay!
‚òÖ lots of Dental tools commonly seen in a clinic.
‚òÖ Superb gameplay with kid friendly interface.
‚òÖ Enjoyable kids sounds, animations, expressions and beautiful high quality HD graphics.

While you keep Pearl clean and healthy, you‚Äôll learn how to keep your own teeth and gums clean and healthy.

title: Dental Hygiene Academy  - Case Studies
description:
DENTAL HYGIENE ACADEMY, INC.
Case Study Board Review for NBDHE (Hygiene), and NBDE (Dental) exams.  Brought to you by AndyRDH, ValerieRDH and various dental hygiene faculty nationwide.

With this app, you will rock on the Board exam!

DENTAL HYGIENE CASE STUDIES

This app is the ONLY app for case studies available in the world!  Studying for case studies is challenging and difficult.  Currently the only way to practice with case studies is to purchase a large, expensive case study book.  These books usually have 15-20 cases and cost between $40-60!  Not only do you have the large expense, but you have the problem of always having to carry it around with you.  With this NEW case study app you can literally study, anytime, anywhere!  This app currently has 25 detailed case studies very similar to what you will find on the REAL national Board exam.  We are currently working on adding more cases to the app and the price will go up at that time.  Buy it now while the price is at it's introductory price and get all the new cases for free once they are ready!

This app is completely interactive!

We have detailed explanations and rationales.  Research has shown that you LEARN and RETAIN information best when you know the rationales of why a question is correct or incorrect.  Studying with questions that only tell you if you are wrong or correct is similar to using flash cards.  Flash cards and similar type apps are good for quick quizzes but they do not help you actually digest the information and bring it from short term memory into long term memory, which is how research shows you learn best.  Detailed explanations and rationales are how you will study best and score high on the National Board!

Use this app while waiting in line at the drive-thru, grocery store, waiting for lecture to start, or your clinic patient to come. No longer will you be worried about all the time you should have been studying, if only you had your textbooks.

This app rocks!

Features:

25 Cases with 15 questions each.  Exactly the same amount of questions per case as the real National Board. (The real National Board exam contains 15 cases).  Purchase the app now and get FREE lifetime upgrades.

Save your report card and email it to yourself or your faculty.  Post and share your scores to social media such as Facebook and Twitter.  Can you beat your classmates?  There will be contests and opportunities for FREE dental T-Shirts and keychains by sharing your screen shots using the #DentalHygieneAcademy.

Countdown timer! Set you Board test date and graduation date and always see how many seconds are remaining! You‚Äôre closer than you think! Are you ready!?
Four mock Board exams with 150 questions each. Rationales included for most questions! Ability to upgrade to more mock Boards.

Exclusive ‚ÄúUnderstood‚Äù option lets you mark a question as ‚Äúunderstood‚Äù so that you no longer see that question again. We have an option in the settings menu to uncheck all understood questions if you want to see them again later.  Marking questions as understood, means each time you take the test, you only focus on ones that you don‚Äôt understand yet. Mark each one understood until you know and comprehend the questions and answers for all the questions! This insures you ‚Äúknow‚Äù before you ‚Äúgo‚Äù take the real Board exam.

Exclusive feature of converting your score percentage of correct answers to what it would be on the real Board exam! This is based off last year‚Äôs five test versions and will convert your percentage to what you would have made on the real test with your results. This is a must for gauging your studying and is only available based on Andy‚Äôs extensive research of multiple scoresheets.

These Mock Board questions are exclusive to Dental Hygiene Academy, Inc.

Get this app and be confident on Board day!

title: Playbrush App
description:
Toothbrushing app for Playbrush Smart One, your intelligent electric toothbrush.

It‚Äôs easy:
Download > Register > Connect Playbrush Smart One via Bluetooth > Improve your oral care

A universe awaits you:

- Performance Check: Get detailed insights on your brushing progress (duration, frequency, coverage and pressure) and receive personal tips for even better results.

- In the Training Area you can choose from a wide variety of oral hygiene tools:

Brushing Coach: A 3D simulation of your set of teeth provides real-time feedback while you interactively brush surface by surface and tooth by tooth. It also helps you to floss.

Challenging Streaks: Improve your status and level of brushing expertise by taking on multi-day challenges.

Overcome boredom when brushing your teeth with our entertainment features and games. Combine knowledge and toothbrushing skill to climb up the leaderboard. Your brushing movements control the action.

- The App learns from you and develops with you over time - based to your individual toothbrushing needs. Brushing modes, time and screen mode are customizable.

Please note:
- The App is only useful in connection with Playbrush Smart One. Get yours on www.playbrush.com
- After registering in the app you can try it out for free for 30 days. You will require a Playbrush plan for continued access.
- Minimum requirements: Android 4.4*

title: Oral Pathology Test Preparation 2020 Ed
description:
Oral Pathology MCQ Exam Preparation 

Key Features of this APP: 
‚Ä¢ At practice mode you can see the explanation describing the correct answer.
‚Ä¢ Real exam style full mock exam with timed interface
‚Ä¢ Ability to create own quick mock by choosing the number of MCQ‚Äôs.
‚Ä¢ You can create your profile and see your result history with just one click.
‚Ä¢ This app contains large number of question set that covers all syllabus area.
Oral and maxillofacial pathology (also termed oral pathology, stomatognathic disease, dental disease, or mouth disease) refers to the diseases of the mouth ("oral cavity" or "stoma"), jaws ("maxillae" or "gnath") and related structures such as salivary glands, temporomandibular joints, facial muscles and perioral skin (the skin around the mouth). The mouth is an important organ with many different functions. It is also prone to a variety of medical and dental disorders.

The specialty oral and maxillofacial pathology is concerned with diagnosis and study of the causes and effects of diseases affecting the oral and maxillofacial region. It is sometimes considered to be a specialty of dentistry and pathology Sometimes the term head and neck pathology is used instead, but this might imply that the pathologist deals with otorhinolaryngologic disorders (i.e. ear, nose and throat) in addition to maxillofacial disorders. In this role there is some overlap between the expertise of head and neck pathologists and that of endocrine pathologists.

Disclaimer:
This applications just is an excellent tool for self study and exam preparation. It's not affiliated with or endorsed by any testing organization, certificate, test name or trademark.

title: Fixsmile
description:
Have you been dreaming of a white smile? 

Now you can see how great it looks on you!

Download FIXSMILE, take a photo and pick a perfect smile from the list. 

Smooth and swift! 

With FIXSMILE you will see how marvelous and healthy your teeth can look.

The astonishing result may help you make a decision to get treatment.

Save the photo on your phone, share it with your friends or send it to your dentist!

Now anyone can see and feel the difference an attractive smile makes!

Fixsmile uses face recognition functionality to find corners of the mouth and apply one of the smiles available from a specially created base.

It is also a very helpful tool for dentists who want to quickly show the patient what effect a treatment can achieve.

Feel free to contact us at any time. We want to improve for you. 
Email: hi@fixsmile.com

title: Dental anesthetic
description: Health professionals have a duty to know the medical history and personal habits of his patients . Dentists should not behave differently . The anamnesis is essential for the correct treatment to be successfully accomplished step . So with a list of questions related to health and well - being of the patient , the dentist is better informed and prepared for the planning of each case . The " Anesthetic Dental " application acts as a helper at the time of application of the anesthetic . From a data obtained in the anamnesis ( the patient's weight ) , and studies concerning the health of the patient ( if he is not diabetic or hypertensive decompensated, if you are allergic to any medication or substance included in anesthetic,  if the case is a woman and she‚Äôs pregnant  ... ) after reviewing each case and choosing the right anesthetic for each patient , the application helps in the correct dosage maximum anesthetic that can be applied , depending on the weight of the case and the anesthetic selected.

title: How to Make Your Teeth White
description:
How To Make Your Teeth White Fast, A lot of people these days are interested in teeth whitening and I assume you are the one of the people who want to learn how to make your teeth white fast. Have you ever looked in the mirror and noticed that your teeth are not so white as they used to be? Maybe it is because of your habits of drinking coffee, wine, smoking or even eating dark berries. If this sounds close to you than you should learn how to make your teeth white fast. Do not be afraid, you are like most of the Americans who want to whiten teeth and feel good about them self. There are lots of ways to do it with minimal effort and it usually doesn't cost too much.

Some topics will be discuss:

- teeth whitening	
- how to whiten teeth naturally	
- how to make teeth white naturally from yellow	
- how to whiten teeth instantly

Features of the app:

Can Use For Offline App
Updated regularly
You can ask questions to us for more idea about content.
Simple app book Knowledge like pocket on your phone
You can also send us your suggestions and we will add them inside the app For more updates.

Learn How To Make Your Teeth White here:

Teeth Whitening Or Bleaching?

There is a difference between whitening and bleaching and you have to decide what you want to do. Since you probably want to find out how to make your teeth white fast, you should determine your current teeth condition. The term "bleaching" may only be used when the teeth are about their natural color. The term "whitening" refers to the restoration of a tooth, flat color, through the removal of stains, dirt and debris.

Every product that will clean up your teeth, such as toothpaste is a whitening solution because it puts your teeth into a healthier direction. It usually comes in the form of bleaching products and brighteners, such as gels, trays, paints, etc.. In the past, many people thought that intrinsic stains become resistant on teeth bleaching. Today, cosmetic dentistry experts believe that even deep-set intrinsic stains can be removed with supervised take-home tooth whitening

Teeth Whitening Solutions

Whether if you want teeth whitening product that is basically one hour bleaching system from your dentist or home use bleaching kits from your local pharmacy, there are plenty solutions to choose from. Only fifteen percent of the population has tried the cosmetic procedure, and misinformation on this issue is widespread. Many dentists believe that a professional home whitening kits that can produce best results are home kits that include low concentration peroxide. The lower the peroxide percentage, the longer it remains secure on the teeth.

Teeth whitening is not permanent solution. Maintenance and "touch-ups" are required for a long lasting solution. Finally, if you choose the right method and you really want to find out how to make your teeth white fast, it is certain that you will succeed.

How To Make Your Teeth White Fast - The Best Method

There are hundreds of methods and products to choose from but your next step is vitally important because it determines whether you will really succeed with teeth whitening or you will just searching for the perfect solution that is already exposed

Download How To Make Your Teeth White now for more tips and method.

title: Dental Panoramic Radiology
description: Dental Panoramic Radiology is an interactive application designed to teach panoramic anatomy. It is intended to be a self-instructional module that can be used by students to prepare for exams or clinic, and by dental professionals as a convenient and practical review tool. Anatomical landmarks within the maxilla, mandible, and surrounding structures are labeled on panoramic radiographs and a three dimensional view is provided for correlation. A description of the principles of panoramic imaging and a brief explanation for all labeled anatomical structures are also included in this module.

title: Dental Shade Navigator
description: Matches teeth color to direct composites. For dental professionals only. ‚Ä®This colorimetry application selects the best shade for direct anterior restorations. It is completely customizable and will only suggest materials available in your practice based on your profile. Setting-up your profile will allow you to guide selection only to materials you currently use. Materials list will continuously be updated and include new shades and manufacturers. Changing your profile preferences is possible at any time in the case you wish to use a different composites kit. If you like to suggest a material to be included in the list, please e-mail at admin@dentalshade.com.‚Ä®The application is free for use while for the evaluation period, will always be free to download yet a minimal charge per use will be applied after evaluation period. You will still be able to test-run it for five clinical cases to see if I apply properly to your practice. If any comments or suggestions, please write to our e-mail.  ‚Ä®A reference point (grey-card) with known color parameters will be necessary for picture calibration process. You can use any grey-card you like or even use your own-made. Application offers the option to set your own reference point Lab-values. ‚Ä®This is the first method tŒø calibrate and match teeth translucency to materials. Using the DSN card (will be soon available to buy online) will give you the option of measuring and matching translucency. For Class IV and Veneer cases, when DSN card is in use, software will primarily match translucency and then luminosity, while for all other combinations will match translucency first, whiteness/yellowness following. ‚Ä®This is an application developed from dentists for dentists and includes meticulous and persistent color measurements. Calculating shade values of direct materials is a time-consuming and demanding procedure, so please be patient if your favorite material is not yet in the list. Will be loaded in time.‚Ä®For instructions of use and tips, please be advised from our web site, www.dentalshade.com

title: Oral Pathology Flashcards
description:
Oral Pathology Flashcards 

Oral and maxillofacial pathology (also termed oral pathology, stomatognathic disease, dental disease, or mouth disease) refers to the diseases of the mouth ("oral cavity" or "stoma"), jaws ("maxillae" or "gnath") and related structures such as salivary glands, temporomandibular joints, facial muscles and perioral skin (the skin around the mouth). The mouth is an important organ with many different functions. It is also prone to a variety of medical and dental disorders.

The specialty oral and maxillofacial pathology is concerned with diagnosis and study of the causes and effects of diseases affecting the oral and maxillofacial region. It is sometimes considered to be a specialty of dentistry and pathology Sometimes the term head and neck pathology is used instead, but this might imply that the pathologist deals with otorhinolaryngologic disorders (i.e. ear, nose and throat) in addition to maxillofacial disorders. In this role there is some overlap between the expertise of head and neck pathologists and that of endocrine pathologists.

Disclaimer:
This applications just is an excellent tool for self study and exam preparation. It's not affiliated with or endorsed by any testing organization, certificate, test name or trademark.

title: Dental Trauma First Aid
description:
First Aid Dental Trauma - Knowledge is lacking among the general population in how to take care of a dental trauma at the scene of an accident. What to do when the tooth is loose? When several teeth are damaged or misplaced? What if it is primary teeth?
For a totally knocked out tooth your first aid could be of vital importance to save the tooth. The Dental Trauma app will help parents, teachers, sport coaches and others to give the best first aid to persons suffering from Dental Trauma. This app shows what to do, and if a visit to a dentist could be delayed or not, when a fragment of the crown is fractured, when there is increased mobility or dislocation of a tooth, or in case of a completely knocked out tooth. It is a great medical guide informing what actions to take at the scene of a dental accident. 

This app is endorsed by IADT (International Association of Dental Traumatology)

Keywords: dental trauma, dental trauma app, tooth injury app, dental injury app, tooth trauma app, tooth accident app, dental accident app, traumatic tooth injury app

title: Crazy Doctor Braces Dentist Mad Adventure
description:
Hello girls! A new game suggested for you. Welcome to Crazy Doctor Braces Dentist Mad Adventure. Come on! All those girls who want to become a dentist doctor in future. As you know, "the sound body has a sound mind". If your body doesn't work properly, then you can't work well. Oh yes! If you want to achieve the goals of life, then you must be healthy.
Oh ho! Are you want to look gorgeous and charming, if yes, then your teeth must be clean and shining.
In this game, you can enjoy as a crazy doctor braces dentist and give a treatment to a patient girl, whose teeth going to destroy. You will extract damaged teeth and put new teeth. Patients are not models who just open their mouths with a poker face, they are so vivid with laughers and tears! Therefore, if you want to see patients different reactions during the teeth treatment if you want to see patients various expressions after their problem teeth are healed, then play Crazy Doctor Braces Dentist Mad Adventure game.
You have to treat them in a real dental office, use various medical instruments, such as a circular plate, braces nail with a tube, oxygen pump, floss the extra dirt from the mouth. You have also make toothpaste with ginger, strawberry and lemon in the machine and fill the paste.put the paste on the brush and rub on teeth and yellow dirt would be removed. You will also choose different teeth colours and decoration for teeth.
FEATURES:
>Lets! brush up dirt from the damage teeth of girl patient.
>Wow! it's amazing, let's make toothpaste with strawberry, lemon and ginger in the machine and rub on teeth and yellow dirt would be removed.
> Spray to remove throat green dirt.
> Circular plate to remove yellow darks on the teeth.
>Suck water from the mouth, extract damaged teeth, Oh yes! put new and different style teeth in empty places.
>Play a puzzle game with cracked teeth.
> Put braces nail with a tube that would hold the braces, put different style braces rings on all teeth.
>Clean water with tissue from lips, kill germs of the mouth.
>Oxygen pump, floss the extra dirt from the mouth.
>Teeth colour, teeth styles/braces styles, throat decoration with colour are available.
>Yeah! Now it's time for playing like a crazy dentist.

Contact Us
Let us know what you want! Queries? Suggestions? Development Support? Contact us any time at cutegirlsappstudio@gmail.com

FaceBook page
https://www.facebook.com/CuteGirlsAppStudio/

For Parents and Guardians
This app may include advertising for certain third parties which will redirect users to third-party sites. About your privacy, this app may enable the collection of limited user data by its carefully selected providers (e.g. ad networks) for limited purposes described in our Privacy Policy (e.g. serve contextual ads and measure their performance). For more information please read our Privacy Policy at https://sites.google.com/view/cutegirlsappstudio/home

title: Dental Clinical Mastery
description:
Dental Clinical Mastery provides essential information and skills training to empower new and practicing dentists. Get up-to-date information and practice guidelines available to give your patients the best care possible.

Master clinical competence and career success with quick, easy access to everything you need to know! Brought to you by the makers of top-selling NBDE Mastery parts I and II apps, Dental Clinical Mastery delivers the most valuable dental practice information right when you need it.

Always be prepared with Dental Clinical Mastery‚Äôs searchable reference materials and how-to guides in your pocket!

Install the free version today and jumpstart your studying!
We have provided a free version of the content that you can try before deciding to upgrade. 

Subscribe today and get access to: 
‚Ä¢ 170+ critical oral pathology guidelines
        ‚Ä¢ Contains useful reference charts & resources
        ‚Ä¢ Includes a complete library of searchable reference materials
‚Ä¢100+ oral pathology differential diagnosis generator items
        ‚Ä¢ Full-color images
        ‚Ä¢ Details on the diagnosis, description, & risk factors 
‚Ä¢50+ evidence-based dental trauma decision guide items
‚Ä¢50+ descriptions of diagnostic procedures
‚Ä¢25+ useful charts and resources
‚Ä¢ Integrated FDA prescribing guidelines

Always be up-to-date with Dental Mastery as your clinical guide.

Dental Clinical Mastery‚Äôs best-practice guidelines and up to date reference information comes from clinical databases, peer-reviewed journals, and other resources, including, but not limited to:
‚Ä¢ Evidence Updates from NIH
‚Ä¢ Federal Drug Administration
‚Ä¢ American Dental Association
‚Ä¢ Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
‚Ä¢ World Health Organization
‚Ä¢ The clinical experience of our writers and peer reviewers

Get access to all questions when you subscribe:
‚Ä¢ 1 Month: one auto-renewing payment of $9.99
‚Ä¢ 12 Months: one auto-renewing payment of $39.99

This app offers two auto-renewing subscription options to help you pass your exam.

-Payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase
-Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
-Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
-Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

description:
Teeth Baby Care is an app that allows you to take care your children's teeth.

You can:

       - Monitor tooth growth.

       - Manage different children.

       - Thanks to the graphic interface you can control all the teeth, 
          tooth for tooth.

       - Check the dates of each event.

       - Manage and control outgoings.

title: miiosmile PRO
description:
miiosmile "Digital Smile Book" is an application for paperless dentistry (dentists and dental technicians). With miiosmile app, dentists and dental technicians can collaborate more easily by sending the digital lab prescription RX  with the following specifications: dental case design, type of dental restoration, details of the material, shade, patient photos and due date.
The dentist can take pictures directly from the application and add them to the digital lab prescription RX. After transmitting the digital lab prescription RX  to the technician, the dentist and the dental technician can use miiosmile chat to communicate.
The dental technician, after receiving the digital lab prescription RX  in the miiosmile app, sends the  dental laboratory status  to the dentist.
 Case Accepted  (to be transmitted when the case was accepted and the production process started)
 Case Completed (is sent when the case has been completed and shipped),
 Delayed Case  (to be sent when the case cannot be completed within the deadline requested by the dentist, and the dental technician proposes a new deadline)

Dental technicians can connect to our new web platform,  https://mylab.miiosmile.app, with the same user and password (as the mobile application)  for service configuration, price per item for each lab restoration and so the dentist can send orders.

You can access the history of laboratory work at any time for each patient.

In order to access all of the application's features, you need to create an account for a dentist or dental technician and activate a subscription.

this is ridiculous as a disclaimer you should be responsible for the data stored on your servers and only you have access to. MIIOSMILE DIGITAL LTD does not require direct patient data and we do not take responsibility if the patient was not properly informed of the processing of the data.

title: Whiten Teeth Naturally
description:
Teeth whitening! We all like to have bright white teeth and a Hollywood smile like all stars. Our Whiten Teeth Naturally application offers you natural and easy solutions to whiten teeth.

This application is for people who want to have white teeth naturally and cheaper. The solution is right in your hands. Follow our advice and you will see the result.

Over time, the teeth turn yellow or stain if there is no daily treatment for the teeth. This yellowing will be accentuated if you have bad habits like: too sweet foods, cigarette, too much coffee, tea, red wine, etc.)

To find whiter and healthier teeth without breaking the bank, simply follow our advice in our Whiten Teeth Naturally application where you will find the treatment you must follow to whiten your teeth and regain your beautiful smile. .

Yellow or stained teeth can appear with age, but some common foods, drinks and even mouthwash can stain teeth. The remedies like in our app Whiten Teeth Naturally which can help whiten teeth and avoid substances that color the teeth can prevent further discoloration.

Whiten Teeth Naturally: use our teeth whitening secrets to have a Hollywood smile

title: Talking Tooth
description:
How many times have you been trapped in a dentist‚Äôs chair (with a spot light shining into your face like in prison ) and had to listen to the story of your dentist‚Äôs life?

And all these embarrassing questions that can not be answered with a mouth full of equipment? 
 
Fortunately, thanks to the Talking Tooth, now it is you who can easily "talk" during a treatment. You are not unarmed in the struggle for a word in a dentist's office anymore!

Simply - launch the application and let your hands talk! 

Relax and depending on your mood press buttons. :)

*It's recommended to run it smartphones rather than bigger devices ;)

recentChanges: The application was written on impulse and this is the very first version. Thanks in advance for any suggestions and tips! Feel free to email me in this case.
comments: I am a dentist. And I think this app is a great idea. I don't know why no one thought of it before. One request to developer is to make the button not fine to say not fine. And to make an additional button saying I think I am going to faint. Also make One button saying my legs are feeling cramped. And one button saying the dental light is bothering me. Could you shift its position. This additional buttons will be extremely useful. One button saying I am gagging or feel like vomiting will also be useful. As also one saying, I think I am going to sneeze or I think I am going to cough. And one saying Could you suck the water from my mouth please. The developer - Your idea is really great and will help people a lot. You could also make one for patients of trauma in other specialities who have neck braces or find it difficult to talk. Looking forward to you incorporating my suggestions. Once these suggestions are incorporated give a paid version that doesn't carry ads. I will buy it. Thanks.
Fun activities for ages 16-100!invited all my friends over to play dis game on my phone!Don't know how this floats with da children's mind tho!
Sooooooooooooooooo good

title: Braces Ideas
description:
Currently you may be considering installing dental braces. Braces, or also known as braces, can indeed change your appearance and cause discomfort at the start of installation. However, dental braces can help you overcome various oral and dental problems.

Braces or braces are often associated with dental care for children or adolescents. This is because usually the teeth that are less neat are only clearly visible in adolescence. Even so, there is actually no age limit for using braces. You can use braces at any age to fix your teeth. As long as your teeth and gums are still healthy and strong.

Braces are not recommended for those of you who have unhealthy gums and teeth because the installation of braces puts excessive pressure on the gums and teeth. Generally people wear braces for two years. However, the duration of using stirrup for each person can be different. This depends on the condition of each of your teeth.

There are options for faster dental therapy methods. However, usually this option is not recommended unless your teeth are really healthy and strong. In addition, this therapy is usually more painful than traditional braces therapy. The reason is, this method of therapy involves a small operation on your jaw. So, even though the therapy lasts only about six months, the healing process is more uncomfortable.

The long duration of using stirrup puts you at risk of changing dentists. Especially if you have to move your residence. Well, changing dentists can cause the cost of installing braces to increase.

Before installing the braces, you should first consider whether you can routinely go to the same dentist for a long time. This is because before installing the braces, you must sign a contractual agreement with the dentist of your choice.

If you change dentists, you must negotiate with your dentist to terminate the contract. Most dentists are willing to make concessions in terminating the contract, but some are unwilling.
